mapper.update: update tbl_activity set owner=#{owner}, name=#{name}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, cost=#{cost}, description=#{description}, editTime=#{editTime}, editBy=#{editBy} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.id, u.name as owner, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.cost, a.description, a.createTime, a.createBy, a.editTime, a.editBy from tbl_activity as a join tbl_user as u on a.owner=u.id where a.id=#{id}

select car.id,u.name as owner,a.startDate,a.endDate,a.name from tbl_clue_activity_relation as car join tbl_activity as a on car.activityId=a.id join tbl_user as u on a.owner=u.id where car.clueId=#{id}

select a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner, a.id from tbl_activity as a join tbl_user as u on a.owner=u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' and a.id not in( select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId} )
select a.name, u.name as owner, a.startDate, a.endDate, a.id from tbl_activity as a join tbl_user as u on a.owner=u.id where a.name like '%' #{name} '%' order by a.createTime desc
